body_html:
I can confirm odd behaviour on CPU. I get:

MatrixInverse:0:
[[ 0.5  0. ]
 [ 0.   0.5]]
MatrixSolve:0:
[[ 0.5  0. ]
 [ 0.   0.5]]
cholesky_solve/MatrixTriangularSolve_1:0:
[[ 0.49999997  0.        ]
 [ 0.          0.49999997]]

Also,

print("scipy.linalg.cho_solve")
print(cho_solve((np.linalg.cholesky(np.eye(2)*2),True),np.eye(2)))

gives,

scipy.linalg.cho_solve
[[ 0.5  0. ]
 [ 0.   0.5]]

body:
I can confirm odd behaviour on CPU. I get:

```
MatrixInverse:0:
[[ 0.5  0. ]
 [ 0.   0.5]]
MatrixSolve:0:
[[ 0.5  0. ]
 [ 0.   0.5]]
cholesky_solve/MatrixTriangularSolve_1:0:
[[ 0.49999997  0.        ]
 [ 0.          0.49999997]]
```
Also,
```
print("scipy.linalg.cho_solve")
print(cho_solve((np.linalg.cholesky(np.eye(2)*2),True),np.eye(2)))
```
gives,
```
scipy.linalg.cho_solve
[[ 0.5  0. ]
 [ 0.   0.5]]
```
